TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlParserContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 分析 XML 片段所需的所有上下文信息。

span.span: Provides all the context information required by the to parse an XML fragment.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建读取的 XML 片段的对象。The following example creates an object that reads an XML fragment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数提供所有`DocumentType`所需的信息。This constructor supplies all `DocumentType` information required by . 如果此`XmlParserContext`传递给，所有 DTD 信息将被都忽略。If this `XmlParserContext` is passed to an , all DTD information is ignored. 如果通过为 DTD `internalSubset`，DTD 用于实体解析，而非针对文档验证。If you pass a DTD as the `internalSubset`, the DTD is used for entity resolution, not for document validation. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`XmlParserContext`读取的 XML 片段。The following example uses an `XmlParserContext` to read an XML fragment. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Property BaseURI As String

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI.

value.span: 用于解析 DTD 文件的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI to use to resolve the DTD file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此可能包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore may contain nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI` 显示这些节点的出处。`BaseURI` shows where these nodes originated.

Public Property DocTypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ DocTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DocTypeName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置文档类型声明的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the document type declaration.
The name of the document type declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性连同， ，和，提供所有的文档类型声明信息。This property, along with , , and , provides all the document type declaration information. 它用于查找并加载所需的 DTD 信息，以便你可以获得所有默认属性和 DTD 中定义的实体。It is used to find and load the necessary DTD information so that you get all the default attributes and entities defined in the DTD.

summary.span: 获取或设置内部 DTD 子集。

span.span: Gets or sets the internal DTD subset.
The internal DTD subset.

value.span: 例如，此属性返回的所有内容之间方括号 <！DOCTYPE doc […]>.

span.span: For example, this property returns everything between the square brackets <!DOCTYPE doc [...]>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性连同， ，和，提供所有的文档类型声明信息。This property, along with , , and , provides all the document type declaration information. 它用于查找并加载所需的 DTD 信息，以便你可以获得所有默认属性和 DTD 中定义的实体。It is used to find and load the necessary DTD information so that you get all the default attributes and entities defined in the DTD. DTD 用于实体解析，而不能用于文档验证。The DTD is used for entity resolution, not for document validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `NamespaceManager`定义当前的命名空间范围，并提供用于查找命名空间信息的方法。The `NamespaceManager` defines the current namespace scope and provides methods for looking up namespace information.
